definition: درب dariba a (darab, درب durba) to be accustomed, be used (ب to), be practiced, trained, skilled (ب in) II to habituate, accustom (هـ, ه s.o.) s.th., في or ب or على to); to practice, drill (ه s.o., على ب or على in); to school, train, coach, tutor (ه s.o., في, ب or على in) V to be accustomed, be used (على or في to); to be or become 275 practiced, skilled, trained, drilled, schooled (على or فى in); to train (athlet.) درب darb pl. دروب durūb narrow mountain pass; path, trail, track; road; alley, lane│درب التبانة d. at-tabbāna the Milky Way
